name: Build Pangenome (gig-map)
description: Build a pangenome dataset from a collection of genes and genomes.

genome_tsv.help: A table of genomes to be downloaded can be accessed from the website: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/datasets/genome/

min_coverage.help: Minimum proportion of a gene which must align in order to retain the alignment

min_identity.help: Minimum percent identity of the amino acid alignment required to retain the alignment

min_genomes_per_gene.help: Minimum number of genomes for a gene to be found in to be included

min_bin_size.help: Minimum number of genes needed to retain a bin

max_dist_genes.help: Maximum Jaccard distance threshold used to group genes into bins
